full_summary:
# **Cancelled - Request for Proposal (RFP) OR23SLTR**

## Background Information

**Announcement Title**: Cancelled-OR23SLTR
**Solicitation Number**: OR23SLTR
**Reference Number**: PW-22-01016903

This solicitation has been cancelled.

## Tender Details

* **Published Date**: 13 December 2022
* **Cancellation Date**: None
* **Expected Contract Commencement Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None
* **Tender Closing Date**: **POSTPONED**

## Trade Agreements and Regions

This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

The regions of interest for this solicitation include:
* Europe
* Canada
* Mexico
* United States

## Goods and Services Details

The solicitation is categorized under:
* **Construction** (CNST)
  * Construction of One and Two Dwelling Buildings
  * Construction of Multi-Dwelling Buildings
  * Construction of Warehouses and Industrial Buildings
  * Construction of Other Buildings
  * Construction Services, Not Elsewhere Specified
  * General Heavy Construction
  * Other Special Trade Construction Work

## Procurement Method

This solicitation will follow a competitive open bidding method.

## Contact Information

For any inquiries or questions regarding this cancellation, please contact:
Mark Smith
Email: [mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
Phone: 613-859-0549

Please note that this announcement is considered final, and any future updates will be notified through separate official channels. The Defence Construction Canada is the contracting entity for this solicitation.

## Note

The **Notice to Proceed** will be issued only to the successful bidder(s) who will be notified separately. No responses or bids are currently being accepted.

Please do not hesitate to reach out to Mark Smith for any questions or concerns.  Thank you for your interest. [mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)  or (613)- 859-0549. 

Are there any corrections that I can make to this rewritten Entry? Likely grammar or punctuation that stands out to you. I am receptive to feedback!
